definition: beat the drum, pass the flower (game in which players sit in a circle passing a flower around while a drum is beaten – when the drumbeat stops, the player holding the flower must sing a song, answer a question, or drink a glass of wine etc)
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
